sentences: Co-Chairs Paul Watkinson and Samuel Adejuwon reviewed an amendment from the EU and a draft decision text proposed by the G-77/China.
The US, supported by several others, requested time to analyze the new texts.
The Co-Chairs will prepare a consolidated text and the group will reconvene informally.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
